players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob, can you tell me what happened last night?"
Bob: "Since Charlie was found dead, I think we should focus on finding the killer. I'll ask Alice if she saw anything suspicious last night."
You: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Keep an eye on Diana, she might be suspicious."
